[B][SIZE=5]About Us[/SIZE][/B] [B]SilentX is a relatively new server and aims to provide you with an enjoyable gaming experience. We have a dedicated development team that is frequent with pushing updates and always strives for perfection in everything we develop, as we believe this is one of the key factors of a good gaming experience. Here at SilentX, you come first.[/B]
[B][SIZE=5]Features[/SIZE][/B] [B]-Full Screen Client! -Constant Updates -Balanced and fair economy -PK'ing / Staking community -Mining, Smithing, Fishing, Agility -Farming, Woodcutting -Fully functional slayer -Banks tabs -PVP -Vote & Donation rewards -Thieving stalls -Fair learning curve -Unique home -Bonus XP weekends -Fight caves -GWD -Barrows -Spirit shields -Watchful eye of support team -Duel arena -Boss and Slayer kill logs -Working PvP System with Bounty Hunter! -Much More[/B]

[SIZE=5]About Us[/SIZE]
SilentX is a relatively new server and aims to provide you with an enjoyable gaming experience.
We have a dedicated development team that is frequent with pushing updates and always strives for perfection in everything we develop,
as we believe this is one of the key factors of a good gaming experience.
Here at SilentX, you come first.

[SIZE=5]Features[/SIZE]
-Full Screen Client!
-Constant Updates
-Balanced and fair economy
-PK’ing / Staking community
-Mining, Smithing, Fishing, Agility
-Farming, Woodcutting
-Fully functional slayer
-Banks tabs
-PVP
-Vote & Donation rewards
-Thieving stalls
-Fair learning curve
-Unique home
-Bonus XP weekends
-Fight caves
-GWD
-Barrows
-Spirit shields
-Watchful eye of support team
-Duel arena
-Boss and Slayer kill logs
-Working PvP System with Bounty Hunter!
-Much More
